author: gshimansky
msg: Fixed bug HARMONY-3758 [drlvm][classloader] assert fires in String_Pool::lookup()
For some reason in unaligned case when string is read byte by byte the signed char bytes
were converted to POINTER_SIZE_INT with sign extend. When string contains unicode
characters ( >= 128) this leads to incorrect results because upper bytes of the
byte are filled with 0xff bytes. The fix is to consider bytes as unsigned before
